title: Using Artificial Intelligence to Solve the Problem of Failed Payments
summary: This article explains how Artificial Intelligence (AI) can effectively solve the problem of failed payments by silently evaluating transactions against numerous failure reasons. It highlights that AI-driven recovery preserves customer relationships and avoids churn, unlike traditional methods that can damage merchant accounts and increase fees.
key_points: AI is the best solution for failed payments, acting silently to resolve issues.
Failed payment recovery is about recovering customers, not just transactions.
Minimizing customer interactions during recovery reduces churn.
Multiple payment resubmission attempts damage merchant accounts and increase fees.
AI handles the complexity of thousands of card-issuing banks and their unique algorithms.
